content: the item is worked in the round from the bottom up this pattern includes three sizes child woman and man you will need approximately 70-100 grams of the recommended yarn for maximum comfort i suggest using a soft yarn such as merino cashmere or yak or blends with a yardage of 300-350 meters per 100 grams when choosing yarn please consider your skin sensitivity as the garment will fit snugly against the forehead and neck merino cashmere or baby cashmere yak or baby yak maybe baby alpaca are the most suitable choices gauge 28 sts and 32 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches in pattern needles 3 0 mm us 2 5 40 cm 16 inch circular needles when matching the stated gauge the stitch count corresponds to the following sizes xs 112 sts head circumference 49 52 cm 19 25 20 5 inches s 126 sts head circumference 54 57 cm 21 25 22 5 inches m 140 sts head circumference 60 63 cm 23 5 24 75 inches total height 36 - 38 cm 14 - 15 inches collar height 14 cm 5 5 inches chin section height 10 cm 4 inches crown height 12 cm -14 cm 4 75 - 5 5 inches nice knitting and use hashtag for your ready works #fiord_song_balaclava
